articles.title: DPRK's Stand on S. Korean Puppets' Anti-DPRK Confrontational Racket Clarified
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand on S. Korean Puppets' Anti-DPRK Confrontational Racket Clarified
 Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the north side delegation to the north-south military talks gave the following answer to a question raised by KCNA Tuesday as regards the south Korean puppets' confrontational racket against the DPRK going beyond a tolerance limit with each passing day:
					 We clarify our stand that should the south Korean puppet authorities continue scattering leaflets and conducting a smear campaign with sheer fabrications, our army will take a resolute practical action as we have already warned.
					
					Long ago we have seen through the sinister aim sought by the south Korean puppet authorities to go on with the anti-DPRK psychological warfare while citing what they called "peculiarities of the south Korean society" and "deeds of non-governmental organizations" as pretexts.
					
					As far as the "peculiarities of the south Korean society" are concerned, the puppet authorities have put even the conservative media under their control.
					
					 As for the "deeds of non-governmental organizations", they are nothing but premeditated operations conducted by the conservative organizations which the "National Intelligence Service" and other institutions of the puppet authorities use as a shock brigade in kicking up an anti-DPRK confrontational racket while directly feeding and clothing them.
					
					 If the puppet authorities respond to our repeated warnings with excuses and pretexts, the army of the DPRK will have no option but to go over to practical actions as clarified at the October 2 north-south military working talks.
					
					As for the "preemptive strike" which the puppet warhawks officially announced as a basic mode of strike at the DPRK, we will counter it with more powerful and advanced preemptive strike of our own style as we have already stated before the world. This is our steadfast stand.
					
					 The advanced preemptive strike of our own style is based on a preemptive strike beyond imagination relying on striking means more powerful than a nuclear weapon. It will, therefore, render any early warning system and interceptor system of the puppet warmongers completely ineffective, and the "preemptive strike" based on the so-called method of fighting a war centering on Network much touted by them will also prove futile. 
					
					The puppet authorities had better bear in mind that the advanced preemptive strike of our own style will reduce everything opposed to the nation and reunification to debris, not just setting them on fire, and it will turn out to be a just war of strike to build an independent reunified state on it.
					
					If the south Korean puppet authorities keep approaching the historic inter-Korean declarations and all the north-south agreements based on them, quite contrary to their words, the DPRK will make a crucial decision including the total severance of the north-south relations.
					
					Practical actions are more important than their lip-service to "respect" for the two declarations adopted between the north and the south and the "resumption of talks" for the implementation of the agreements.
					
					 The army of the DPRK will provide a powerful military guarantee for the crucial decision to be made by our side in case the south Korean puppets persist in their undisguised act of scrapping the historic north-south declarations and military agreements.
					
					 The army of the DPRK will closely follow the future movement of the puppet authorities.

articles.title: Talks between Foreign Ministers of DPRK and Myanmar Held
articles.content:
Talks between Foreign Ministers of DPRK and Myanmar Held
 Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun and Foreign Minister of the Union of Myanmar U Nyan Win at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					Present there were officials concerned from the DPRK side and the party of Myanmar foreign minister from the side of Myanmar.
					
					 At the talks the two sides exchanged views on the issue of boosting the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Myanmar and on matters of mutual concern.

articles.title: Reception for FM of Myanmar and His Party
articles.content:
Reception for FM of Myanmar and His Party
 Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government hosted a reception for U Nyan Win, foreign minister of Myanmar, and his party on a visit to the DPRK at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Monday.
					 Present there on invitation were the foreign minister of Myanmar and his party.
					
					 Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, and officials concerned were on hand.
					
					 Pak Ui Chun in his speech at the reception said that the visit to the DPRK by the foreign minister of Myanmar and his party marks a significant occasion in further deepening mutual understanding and confidence.
					
					Referring to the efforts being made by the government and people of Myanmar to defend stability and sovereignty of the country, he hoped that everything would go well in friendly Myanmar.
					
					 He expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Myanmar would grow stronger as wished by the peoples of the two countries and in mutual interests.
					
					 U Nyan Win in his speech expressed thanks for warm hospitality accorded to them and said that his delegation came here to further develop the friendly relations with the DPRK.
					
					He said that he was pleased to see startling successes achieved in the DPRK under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He hoped that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop more actively in the future.

articles.title: Greetings to Czech President
articles.content:
Greetings to Czech President
 Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, on Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Vaclav Klaus, President of the Czech Republic, on the occasion of its national day.
					 Kim in the message wished the president success in his work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Czech Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Czech Prime Minister
 Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Prime Minister Mirek Topolanek on the occasion of the national day of the Czech Republic.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the relations between the two countries would continue to favorably develop in the interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets New British Ambassador
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets New British Ambassador
 Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday met and had a talk with Peter Hughes, new ambassador of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
					 On hand was Ri Jong Hyok, chairman of the DPRK-British Friendship Parliamentary Group.

articles.title: Friendship Visiting Groups Leave for China
articles.content:
Friendship Visiting Groups Leave for China
 Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- A friendship visiting group of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Ri Sung Ho, vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, and the same group of the Korean People's Army headed by its Col. General Kim Chun Sam left here today to visit China.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Unionists Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of Unionists Assailed
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea in a statement on Tuesday assailed the Lee Myung Bak group for working hard to push the north-south relations to a catastrophe and revive the fascist dictatorship in south Korea through sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with the DPRK. 
					Referring to the extremely abnormal situation prevailing in south Korea where the just activities conducted by the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) for rights and interests of the workers and the reunification of the country are incriminated under the absurd pretext of "eliminating pro-north leftist forces", unionists are walked off after being handcuffed and members of the Government Employees' Union of south Korea are disallowed to visit Pyongyang, the statement continued:
					
					 This is traitorous and anti-reunification rowdyism of the group of traitors aimed to stamp out all activities for democratic freedom and rights and the reunification of the country in south Korea, and an intolerable challenge to the people from all walks of life desirous of new politics, new life.
					
					 The wholesale suppression launched by the group against the progressive movement organizations including the KCTU while talking about "forces behind scene" is aimed to attain their black-hearted intention to shift the responsibility for the bedeviled north-south relations and the deterioration of the people's living caused by their sycophancy toward the U.S. and the confrontation with the DPRK onto others and tide over the ruling crisis.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that if the above-said group is allowed to stay in power, it will revive the pro-U.S. fascist dictatorship in south Korea to ruthlessly trample down upon the movement for independence, democracy and reunification and bring disasters to all Koreans. 
					
					 All workers in the DPRK will as always wage a vigorous struggle for independent reunification and peace and prosperity together with the south Korean workers under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, great programmes for national reunification.

articles.title: Chinese Art Troupe Gives Performances
articles.content:
Chinese Art Troupe Gives Performances
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The visiting art troupe of the Political Department of the Air Force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army staged the Chinese modern dance drama "A song in praise of Hongmei" at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Oct. 26 and 27.
					The performances were appreciated by officials of ministries and national institutions, creators, artistes and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Among the audience were staff members of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 The art troupe is loved by the Chinese army and people for having created and performed a lot of successful literary and art works for the last more than 50 years. It made performance tours of different countries of the world.
					
					 The performances deeply impressed the audiences for their revolutionary contents, truthful acting of dancers, classical and modern dance style, peculiar music and stage lighting and decor. 
					
					 Floral baskets were conveyed to the performers in congratulation of their successful performances.

articles.title: Anniversary of Opening of DPRK-Bulgaria Diplomatic Relations Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Opening of DPRK-Bulgaria Diplomatic Relations Marked
 Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Stoyan Gortchivkin, Bulgarian charge d' affaires a.i. here, arranged a reception on Oct. 27 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the opening of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Bulgaria. 
					Present there on invitation were Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Myong San, vice-minister of Foreign Trade,  Hong Son Ok, vice-chairwoman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of various countries here.
					
					On hand were members of the delegation of the foreign ministry of the Republic of Bulgaria headed by Deputy Minister Radion Popov and staff members of the Bulgarian embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Young People Visit Kumsusan Memorial Palace
articles.content:
Young People Visit Kumsusan Memorial Palace
 Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The participants in the national conference of active members of primary organizations of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung on Tuesday. 
					 They visited the sacred temple of Juche with yearning and boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 They paid respectful homage to the President who brought up the league to be the reliable organisation of young vanguard which would carry forward the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation, and successfully solved the youth issue for the first time in history.

articles.title: Persons of Merit in Songun Era, Pride of Korea
articles.content:
Persons of Merit in Songun Era, Pride of Korea
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- There are a lot of true patriots who will remain long in the memory of the motherland and the people. 
					 Among them there are men and women of distinguished services in the Songun era.
					
					 They have left remarkable marks of patriotism in the van of the endeavors to usher in a magnificent new era of defending socialism and building a great, prosperous and powerful nation over the last ten years or more in which the motherland faced a grim test.
					
					 They have faithfully supported, rain or shine, the Songun leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea with clean conscience and sense of obligation, thinking of the country before themselves.
					
					 Most illustrious is the life of Jong Chun Sil, director of the Jonchon County Commercial Management Office, who has worked devotedly at one post entrusted her by the Party and the motherland till her seventieth year at hand from her maidenhood.
					
					 She made Herculean efforts in toilsome work such as the creation of raw material bases to enhance the living standard of the people in the county even in the hard time of "Arduous March," the forced march. She provides the residents with what they need without fail by normally using the "Our Family Notebook" which she initiated scores of years ago.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave her, who had supported the Party invariably in her young and old age, the noble titles of passionate patriot, indomitable woman revolutionary and true servant of the people.
					
					 The men and women of meritorious services in the Songun era feel attached to their jobs and take an attitude befitting masters towards their work and they always think and work to make as much contribution as they can to the prosperity of the country.
					
					 An Jong Min, leader of Mining Workteam  No. 1 of the April 5 Pit of the Kumgol Mine under the Komdok Mining Complex, Kim Tae Song, leader of Workteam No. 6 of the Kim Je Won Co-op Farm in Jaeryong County, South Hwanghae Province, Kim Sa Myong, chief of the Control Machine Institute under the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Kyong Su, a teacher of the Changju Branch of the Songryon Middle School in Pyokdong County, North Phyongan Province, and Kim Song Nyo of the Songgan County Road Management Brigade in Jagang Province and the members of her family workteam and many other persons of merit have worked heart and soul at their revolutionary posts without hoping for other's appreciation.
					
					 Countless are the  patriotic deeds of the  men and women of merit in the Songun era  for the prosperity of the motherland, among them So Hye Suk residing in Songuja-dong, Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang who brought up orphans as she would her own children, Kim Chun Gum, chief of the Industrial Experimental Institute under the Puyun Mine who solved scientific and technological problems significant in improving the diet of the people and Ri Ung Chan, forest inspector of Taeri Workers' District, Kangdong County, Pyongyang, who devoted himself to increasing forest resources of the country. 
					
					 Their endeavors are a noble example of a heroic life and they powerfully inspire the people to the gigantic struggle for building a great, prosperous and powerful socialist country.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Intention to Have Political Bargaining with DPRK Blasted
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Intention to Have Political Bargaining with DPRK Blasted
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Aso is staging such a clumsy farce as contemplating a political bargaining with the DPRK, regarding the settlement of the abduction issue as a precondition for normalizing the DPRK-Japan relations. This comes under fire by a signed commentary of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday. 
					 It observes: This is nothing but a mean and despicable attitude and arrogant and stupid demeanor peculiar to Japan. There have been no state relations between the DPRK and Japan so far and distrust and antagonism have grown deep between them mainly because Japan has zealously pursued a hostile policy towards the DPRK, refusing to make honest repentance and reparation for the crimes committed by Japan in the past. 
					
					Japan should settle the issue of liquidating its past without fail before opting for the normalization of the DPRK-Japan relations. 
					
					Japan's attitude of regarding the settlement of the abduction issue as a precondition for normalizing the DPRK-Japan relations is nothing but a last-ditch effort to get rid of the miserable situation where it finds itself in a dilemma isolated at home and abroad and dodge the liquidation of its past crimes at any cost.
					
					The public expresses ridicule and disillusionment with Japan's act of regarding the abduction issue as a precondition for normalizing the DPRK-Japan relations, shelving the issue of redeeming its past crimes, as a fraud of political half-wits and an act of imposters. 
					
					Japan will have no rosy future unless it redresses its past wrongs. The public is unanimous in claiming it is something unfortunate to note that there are many politicians in Japan but no politicians with logical thinking faculty and vision. Japan should lend an ear to this. 
					
					Japan would be well advised to stop looking at something else in pursuance of a foolish aim and opt for redressing its past crimes as early as possible.

articles.title: Japan's Extension of Its Sanctions against DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Extension of Its Sanctions against DPRK Slammed
 Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The Japanese Diet's recent decision to extend sanctions against the DPRK including the embargo on the latter's ships for another six months over the so-called abduction issue was prompted by a criminal intention to torpedo the process of denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula and extremely bedevil the DPRK-Japan relations in a bid to create an environment favorable for converting Japan into a military giant and launching overseas aggression. Minju Joson Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary.  
					 Before vociferating about someone's abduction issue, Japan should have honestly admitted and repented of and settled the issue of the forcible drafting of Koreans committed by the Japanese imperialists in the past and the luring and abduction of citizens of the DPRK perpetrated by Japan in recent years, the commentary notes, and goes on: 
					
					 Japan's call for tightening "sanctions" against the DPRK and increasing pressure upon it over the abduction issue is nothing but a rash act which reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 It is as foolish and ridiculous an act as running one's head to a wall for Japan to try to do harm to the DPRK through "sanctions" and "pressure".
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are sticking to the sanctions even though they know well such action is useless because they do not work on the DPRK at all.  Lurking behind this is the blacked-hearted intention of Japan to evade the liquidation of its past and justify the violation of the rights of Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 Japan seeks to put pressure upon someone and browbeat him by extending the sanctions against the DPRK to fish in troubled waters. This is nothing but a foolish and clumsy attempt of a "political pigmy."
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should make honest repentance and proper reparation for the crimes committed by Japan in the past, keenly aware that its settlement of its past crimes is the core issue in the DPRK-Japan relations. 
					
					 They should bear in mind that "sanctions" and "pressure" would only precipitate their self-destruction.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Il Sung's Work Observed 
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 60th anniversary of the publication of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Force the U.S. Imperialist Aggressor Forces to Withdraw from South Korea and Reunify the Country Independently".
					 The work comprehensively clarifies the principled stand of the DPRK to settle the issue of national reunification by the concerted efforts of the Korean people without depending on outsiders and achieve national unity. It also indicates tasks and ways for waging a more courageous struggle against the traitors to the nation selling off the country and the nation and the U.S. imperialist aggressors keen to reduce south Korea to their colony and an advanced base for aggression against the DPRK.
					
					Rodong Sinmun today in a signed article dedicated to the anniversary of the work notes that independence against the U.S. and the withdrawal of the U.S. troops are the main slogan for struggle to be consistently put up by the Koreans in the whole course of the struggle to accomplish the cause of independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 More than 60 years have passed since the U.S. imperialists occupied south Korea but their strategy towards Korea to keep the Korean nation divided and dominate it remains unchanged.
					
					It is the only way out for the Korean nation to force the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops to pull out of south Korea and put an end to the U.S. interference in the national internal affairs and to do so is the only just way of achieving the reunification of the country and national prosperity. To this end it is necessary to hold higher the banner of independence against the U.S. and the struggle for the withdrawal of the U.S. troops.
					
					 In order to achieve independence against the U.S. and retake the usurped national sovereignty it is necessary to resolutely struggle against the sycophants serving the U.S. and traitors to the nation. 
					
					 If such Lee Myung Bak group as sycophantic traitors who commit all sorts of acts of treachery, kowtowing to outside forces, in pursuit of personal luxury and glory in utter disregard of the destiny of the country and the nation are allowed to stay in power, the Korean nation will never be able to achieve the reunification of the country but meet only the war disaster imposed upon it by them.

articles.title: Puppet Prosecution's Suppression Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Prosecution's Suppression Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration strongly protested against the puppet prosecution's suppression on Oct. 24, according to the south Korean CBS.
					 The solidarity said that that day the prosecution authorities labeled the above-said organization an "enemy-benefiting organization" and detained and indicted its four core members on charges of the violation of the ill-famed "National Security Law," adding that this is blatant suppression of the reunification movement and retaliation against candlelight actions.
					
					In the meantime, the joint defence panel for the solidarity, etc. held an emergency press conference on the same day in protest against the puppet prosecution's tyrannical action. 
					
					Speakers at the press conference held that the solidarity has conducted a legitimate mass movement for reunification for the past 8 years since its formation.
					
					 They stressed that it is an unpardonable provocation that the prosecution brought charges of the violation of the NSL to the detained and indicted core members of the organization for the mere reason that they conducted common non-governmental exchange after labeling the solidarity "an organization following the Juche idea."

articles.title: Large-Scale Anti-"Government" Struggle Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Large-scale Anti-"Government" Struggle Declared in S. Korea
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- At least 100 civic and social organizations including the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society and the Solidarity for Progress of south Korea and the Netizen Association held an inaugural ceremony of the People's Council for Livelihood and Democracy, a solidarity organization against Lee Myung Bak, in Seoul on Oct. 25, according to the KBS and the MBC of south Korea.
					Speakers at the ceremony accused the present "government" of pursuing a policy running counter to the people's livelihood and democracy as evidenced by its moves to privatize public enterprises, health care institutions and others, adding that the above-said council would join the citizens in the movement to check this in the future.
					
					 They declared that the council would launch a large-scale anti- "government" struggle including the holding of  a rally on the emergency situation in November unless the Lee Myung Bak group makes a switchover from its present policy to a policy centered on the people.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants held a candlelight cultural event.

articles.title: Candlelight Action Staged against Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Control Media
articles.content:
Candlelight Action Staged against Lee Myung Bak Group's Moves to Control Media
 Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Former and incumbent media persons of media organizations in south Korea including the south Korean Press Trade Union and the New Press Forum and the Journalists' Association staged a candlelight action in Seoul on Oct. 24 in protest against the moves of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to put media under its control.
					 Prior to this, they held a meeting of media persons for adopting a declaration on the situation for defending people's sovereignty and freedom of speech in front of the building of "Yonhap TV News."
					
					A declaration on the situation signed by at least 7,800 media persons was made public at the meeting.
					
					It accused the Lee "government" of pursuing a biased media policy to privatize the public broadcasting services and monopolize them for its stay in power.
					
					 The declaration deplored that if this is allowed, lies and sophism protecting the interests of those in power will prevail in this land.
					
					 It called for putting a definite end to the "government's" moves to introduce a policy for running the press and broadcasting institutions at the same time and privatizing the public broadcasting services. It also demanded Choe Si Jung, chairman of the Broadcasting and Communication Committee, Ri Tong Gwan, a spokesman for "Chongwadae", Ryu In Chon, minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism, and others step down of their own accord.
					
					 Meanwhile, the press trade union conducted a vote on the general strike from Oct. 21 to 23 and decided to call a strike in protest against the "government's" moves to put the public broadcasting services under its control.
					
					The organization vowed to launch a general strike in case the "government" hurls police into the building of "Yonhap TV News" and it unilaterally passes the "bills" on the biased media policy through the above-said committee and the "National Assembly."

articles.title: WPK's Leadership over Socialist Construction Praised
articles.content:
WPK's Leadership over Socialist Construction Praised
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Italy and Romania on Oct. 7 and 8 on the occasions of the 63rd anniversary of the foundation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the 82nd anniversary of the formation of the "Down-with-Imperialism Union."
					 Mauro Cazadio, general secretary of the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy, said at the seminar that the WPK has led the Korean people's struggle for socialist construction to victory while frustrating the continued moves of the imperialists against the DPRK under the banner of the Juche idea holding President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem over the past six decades.
					
					All the successes made in the DPRK are a product of the strenuous efforts made by the WPK to rally all the people around the leader as one and strictly maintain the principle of independence, self-supporting and self-reliance in socialist construction, he said, and continued:
					
					 The fighting experience of the WPK serves as a valuable textbook, an example to be followed by the progressive parties struggling for independence against imperialism, and for peace and a new society.
					
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union, stressed that the WPK would achieve greater success in socialist construction, holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as its general secretary.

articles.title: Responderemos con avanzado golpe preventivo a nuestro estilo
articles.content:
Responderemos con avanzado golpe preventivo a nuestro estilo
Pyongyang, 28 de octubre (ATCC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea formulada en relacion con que con el paso de los dias, pasan el limite alarmante los alborotos de enfrentamiento con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea armados por los titeres surcoreanos, el portavoz de la delegacion de la parte Norte a las conversaciones militares Norte-Sur respondio el dia 28 como sigue:
					Ponemos en claro nuestra posicion de que de proseguir el lanzamiento de volantes y la intrigante campana demagogica de las autoridades titeres surcoreanas, se tomaran, como hemos advertido ya, resueltas acciones practicas del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Nos dimos cuenta ya hace mucho tiempo del malsano intento de las autoridades titeres surcoreanas de seguir recurriendo a la guerra psicologica anti-RPDC pretextando que la "sociedad surcoreana tiene caracter especial" y que es "obra de las entidades civiles".
					
					Dicho "caracter especial" significa precisamente la particular situacion de la sociedad surcoreana en que las autoridades titeres controlan hasta los medios de prensa conservadores.
					
					Si desenmascaramos la teoria de la "obra de las entidades civiles", estas de caracter conservador al frente de la campana de confrontacion con la RPDC libran premeditadamente sus actividades contra esta sustentandose con los recursos financieros que les ofrecen el "Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia" y otros organos gubernamentales titeres.
					
					 Si las autoridades titeres abordan hasta el final nuestras advertencias reiteradas con subterfugios y pretextos, el EPC se ve obligado a pasar a la accion practica como hemos afirmado en las conversaciones de expertos militares Norte-Sur que tuvieron lugar el pasado 2 de octubre.
					
					Nuestra inconmovible posicion consiste en responder con el mas fuerte y avanzado ataque preventivo a nuestro estilo, como ya hemos aclarado a la vista del mundo, al "golpe preventivo" definido y anunciado oficialmente por los belicistas titeres surcoreanos como principal modo ofensivo contra la RPDC.  
					
					El avanzado ataque preventivo a nuestro estilo es el inimaginable, basado en el medio ofensivo mas potente que la bomba atomica, que neutralizara cualquier sistema de alarma previa o de interceptacion de misiles de los belicistas titeres y acabara con el golpe preventivo al estilo de la supuesta "guerra centrada en Network" de que ellos hablan tanto.
					
					Las autoridades titeres deben tener presente que el avanzado ataque preventivo a nuestro estilo no se tratara de un simple mar de fuego sino la ofensiva de justicia para reducir a cenizas todo lo antinacional y anti-reunificacion y edificar sobre ellas una patria reunificada independiente.
					
					Si las autoridades titeres surcoreanas siguen tratando las historicas Declaraciones Conjuntas Norte-Sur y todos los consiguientes acuerdos bilaterales con la discordancia entre palabras y acciones, se pondran en practica nuestras decisiones importantes incluyendo la ruptura total de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					La accion practica es mas importante que las meras palabras como el "respeto" a ambas declaraciones o la "reanudacion del dialogo" para el cumplimiento de los acuerdos.
					
					Si continua el abierto rompimiento de las historicas declaraciones Norte-Sur y los acuerdos militares por parte de los titeres, el Ejercito Popular de Corea asegurara con su poderosisima fuerza armada las decisiones importantes a ser tomadas por nuestra parte.
					
					El EPC seguira de cerca los movimientos posteriores de las autoridades titeres.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea y Myanmar
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre cancilleres de Corea y Myanmar
Pyongyang, 28 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar este martes en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las conversaciones entre el canciller de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Ui Chun, y su homologo de la Union de Myanmar U Nyan Win. 
					Participaron por la parte coreana los funcionarios correspondientes y, por la de Myanmar, y la comitiva del canciller. 
					
					En la ocasion ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el mayor desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises y otros problemas de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Gobierno de RPDC ofrece banquete en honor del canciller de Myanmar
articles.content:
Gobierno de RPDC ofrece banquete en honor del canciller de Myanmar
Pyongyang, 28 de octubre (ATCC) -- El gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio el dia 27 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae un banquete en honor de U Nyan Win, canciller de la Union de Myanmar, de visita en Corea, y su comitiva. 
					Estuvieron presentes alli el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores Pak Ui Chun, y otros funcionarios coreanos. 
					
					Pak Ui Chun, en su discurso, senalo que la visita del canciller de Myanmar a Corea sirve de un motivo significante para fomentar el entendimiento y la confianza mutuos. 
					
					 El gobierno y el pueblo de Myanmar se esfuerzan por defender la estabilidad y la soberania del pais, afirmo y deseo que se marchen bien todas las cosas en ese pais amistoso.
					
					 Expreso su conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran conforme a la aspiracion y los intereses mutuos de los pueblos de ambos paises. 
					
					U Nyan Win, a su vez, expreso su agradecimiento por la acogida cordial de la parte coreana y dijo que su delegacion realiza esta visita para desarrollar las relaciones de amistad con la RPDC.
					
					 Se alegro de haber visto los exitos asombrosos logrados en Corea bajo la sabia direccion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il.
					
					  Deseo que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se desarrollen con mas vigor en lo adelante.

articles.title: FGSC denuncia maniobras de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
FGSC denuncia maniobras de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 28 de octubre (ATCC) -- Ahora en el Sur de Corea, bajo el intrigante rotulo de "liquidacion de las fuerzas izquierdistas pro-Norte", se da la situacion muy anormal: se califican de "delitos" las justas actividades de la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos (CSS) por los derechos e intereses de los obreros y la reunificacion del pais y se arrestan sus gremiales, por una parte y por la otra, se impide la visita a Pyongyang de los miembros del Sindicato de los Oficiales Publicos.
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) publico el dia 28 una declaracion que denuncia a la banda de Lee Myung Bak que con el servilismo a Estados Unidos y las maniobras de confrontacion anti-RPDC llevo al fracaso las relaciones Norte-Sur e intenta resucitar el fantasma de la dictadura fascista en el Sur de Corea.
					
					 El documento prosigue:
					
					 Tal comportamiento de la banda de traidores es un acto imprudente para liquidar en el Sur de Corea todas las actividades por la libertad y los derechos democraticos y la reunificacion del pais y un desafio imperdonable contra los habitantes de distintos sectores aspirantes a la nueva politica y nueva vida.     
					
					La represion total de la banda de traidores contra las entidades del movimiento progresista incluyendo la CSS que se perpetra bajo el rotulo de las "fuerzas traseras" parte de la malsana intencion tendente a  imputar a otros la responsabilidad del actual fracaso de las relaciones intercoreanas y de la vida miserable del pueblo originados por el servilismo a EE.UU. y las maniobras de confrontacion anti-RPDC y  remediar la crisis de su dominacion.
					
					 Todo el hecho demuestra fehacientemente que al dejar intacta la banda de traidores en el Sur de Corea resurgira el regimen de dictadura fascista proyanqui, sera pisoteado indiscriminadamente el movimiento por la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion y toda la nacion coreana sufrira calamidades.
					
					Todos los obreros de la RPDC, enarbolando la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programas de la reunificacion de la patria, librara con mas vigor tambien en el futuro la lucha por la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad junto con los obreros surcoreanos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia alboroto anti-RPDC en Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia alboroto anti-RPDC en Japon
Pyongyang, 28 de octubre (ATCC) -- Al publicar este martes un comentario individual, el periodico Rodong Sinmun revela que el primer ministro japones Aso escenifica una farsa barata en su intento de hacer regateo politico con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea presentando la solucion del problema del secuestro como premisa del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas Corea-Japon, lo cual es un procedimiento tan pueril y sucio y un acto altanero y picaro de Japon y prosigue:
					 Japon vino practicando su brutal politica hostil a la RPDC lejos de pedir disculpas y recompensar sinceramente por sus crimenes del pasado. He aqui la causa fundamental de la inexistencia de las relaciones estatales y de la desconfianza y antagonismo acumulados entre ambas partes.
					
					 El problema, que debe ser resuelto sin falta antes de la normalizacion de las relaciones bilaterales, es precisamente la liquidacion del pasado criminal
					
					 Sin embargo, los reaccionarios japoneses insisten en que el problema del secuestro es la premisa del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas dejando a un lado tal liquidacion porque no les queda otro remedio para salir del atolladero en que se ven aislados dentro y fuera del pais y evadir a todo trance dicha liquidacion.
					
					 La gente esta burlandose de tal conducta del pais isleno calificandola de estafa y especulacion de los politiqueros imbeciles.
					
					 Sin la liquidacion del pasado criminal no puede haber el claro futuro de Japon. 
					
					 Este pais isleno debe tener presente el dicho: "!Que lastima que entre muchos japoneses, que se hacen politicos, no haya ninguno que piense logicamente y tenga la capacidad de prever!"
					
					 Este pais debe proceder cuanto antes a la liquidacion del pasado criminal en lugar de estar distraido por su ambicion irrealizable.
